title: Suicide blast at Islamabad mosque kills 31, MEA snubs Pak claim of Indian hand
summary_full: A devastating suicide bombing at a Shia mosque in Islamabad on Friday claimed at least 31 lives and injured over 170, marking the capital's deadliest attack since 2008. The bomber detonated himself at the mosque's entrance after Friday prayers. Pakistan's Defence Minister alleged Indian sponsorship, a claim India vehemently rejected as baseless and a diversion from domestic issues.
